summary: Self-motivated, ambitious individual with problem solving mindset. Three years supply chain working experiences and strong international business law knowledge. Open to international trade, supply chain, and data analysis opportunities.

school.name: Fontys Venlo University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
- Manage multiple programs with overall revenue up to 80MM, ensuring the timely completion of critical milestones and deliveries for 13+ global clients with various production lines ranging from server boards to embedded systems. 
- Consult and discuss business terms and contracts with external legal consultants and collaborate with multicultural teams to ensure on-time deliveries, while managing global suppliers from the UK, Germany, and the Netherlands. 
- Conduct program life-cycle management (OEM and assembly orders) to meet customers’ needs on time, covering materials, forecasting, production capacity, payment, shipping, and escalations to achieve the program mission.
- Boost overall process efficiency by 25% with execution and collaboration excellence (from 8-12 weeks to 6-8 weeks), and accomplish order delivery with the earliest production planning efforts in just 4 months.
- Successfully resolve regional material shortage crisis by leading and negotiating with HQ and suppliers within a week with viable project plans and solutions provided. 
- Conduct business and data analysis for key indicators using tools such as EXCEL, SAP, and Pre-Mo internal system to facilitate the working process.
profile_positions.title: Program Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Corporate ESG Project                                                                                                                                          
- Led the project team of 4 to identify an existing ESG issue of Fintech and banking corporates in the Netherlands. 
- Focused on multiple aspects of ESG, including legal and regulatory, social innovation, employees and culture, etc. 
- Performed analysis of the yearly reports of 3 top-tier Dutch banks (ING, ABN, and Rabobank) from 2019 to 2021. 
- Liaised effectively with the cross-cultural team (Italian, Turkish, and Greek members) ensuring the timely completion.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead and Researcher

profile_positions.description:
International Competition Law, Antitrust Law Analysis Project
- Performed analysis of EU and US competition law and deliberated the effects on business, market, law, and legislation.  
- Studied the positive and negative impacts of mergers and acquisitions (M&A) of both Taiwan and EU corporates. 
- Conducted in-depth research and generated insights on how US and EU jurisdictions differ regarding the enforcement of mergers and acquisitions (M&A) and Antitrust laws. 
- Presented the project results of the group case study in front of the class 2 times.
profile_positions.title: Law Project Researcher and Presenter

company.name: Dormitory of Chung Yuan Christian University

profile_positions.location: 台灣 桃園市 中壢區
profile_positions.company: Dormitory of Chung Yuan Christian University
profile_positions.description:
- Taking the lead in reviewing stationery procurement contracts with suppliers.
- Negotiating payment terms – as a result from 30 days to 45 days.
- Exploring new local suppliers and new suppliers to reduce TCO per year.
- Leading student union to organize dormitory equipment renewal project.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Administrator

profile_positions.location: 台灣 高雄市 高雄市
profile_positions.description:
- Managing agriculture inventory on daily basis, responsible for sell-out stock movement, and introducing a digital inventory system to increase stock accuracy.
- Monitoring product's lifecycles to ensure necessary actions are being taken.
- Forecasting ahead before harvest season. Maintaining relationships with whole-sellers and resellers,
prioritized harvest allocation to key account customers.
- Generating year financial report for yearly sales revenue, cost and margin trend, and business growth
rate.
- Analyzed failure rate by product lines, identifying root causes, and taking action for improvement plans
profile_positions.title: Planner of Tomato Agriculture firm

profile_positions.description:
Antitrust and Competition Law Research | EU, US, and Taiwan
- Performed thorough data collection to assist in compiling the legislative history of the Fair-Trade Act in Taiwan as well as related instruments, acts, and precedents as preparation for amendments to Taiwan antitrust and competition law.
- Organized and compiled the legislative history of US, EU, and Japan antitrust law from the past 10 years, with attention paid to the processes of legislation and later amendments to ensure an alignment of objectives.
- Provided legal consultation based on related provisions, judgments, and rulings of US, EU, and Japan antitrust law. Drafted enforcement rules of the Fair-Trade Act for the judge’s approval.
- Drafted articles of the law for future reference and submitted legal opinions. Engaged in the whole process from data collection to enforcement rules drafting, which saw final amendments to the act enacted on April 2022.
- Participated in meetings to present analyses for the High Court and Supreme Court judges, and proactively resolved a long-existing efficiency problem after shortening the completion of minutes from 2 weeks to around 4-5 days.
- Operated as a strong team player when contacting external institutions, foreign courts, and legal agencies for assistance. Organized meetings with the president and High Court judges to discuss proposals for amendments.
profile_positions.title: Legal Assistant
